Key Match Events: Pickford delayed Akanji's penalty kick by walking away to retrieve his water bottle, giving him more time to plan his dive.
Pre-Game Insights: Southgate gathered only the players who were on the pitch at the end of extra time to prevent distractions.
England adopted a 'buddy system' where one player supported each taker after their kick.
Post-Match Reflections: Pickford's delay tactics contributed significantly to England's victory.
Southgate praised the team's preparation and process for penalty shootouts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Referee Daniele Orsato intervened to stop Pickford's tactics after Akanji's penalty.
Alexander-Arnold's penalty was emphatic and sealed the victory for England.
